verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came again unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H3213>Howl<s%> <S%H1929>you<s%>, Woe is the <S%H3117>day<s%>!

For the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, even the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, a <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; it shall be the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.

And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and great <S%H2479>pain<s%> shall be in <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, when the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and they shall take <S%H3947>away<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, and her <S%H3247>foundations<s%> shall be broken <S%H2040>down<s%>.

<S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, and <S%H6316>Libya<s%>, and <S%H3865>Lydia<s%>, and all the <S%H6153>mingled<s%> <S%H3552>people<s%>, and Chub, and the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> that is in <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> with them by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; They also that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>; and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%>: from the <S%H4024>tower<s%> of <S%H5482>Syene<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> in it by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And they shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H2717>wasted<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I have <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and when all her <S%H5826>helpers<s%> shall be <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H4397>messengers<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H6440>me<s%> in <S%H6716>ships<s%> to make the <S%H983>careless<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H2729>afraid<s%>, and great <S%H2479>pain<s%> shall come upon <S%H3117>them<s%>, as in the day of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H935>for<s%>, behold, it comes.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will also make the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

He and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6184>him<s%>, the terrible of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> against <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H2975>rivers<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%>, and <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>: and I will make the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8074>waste<s%>, and all that is in <S%H4393>it<s%>, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%>: I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will also <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and I will cause their <S%H457>images<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of <S%H5297>Noph<s%>; and there shall be no more a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H3374>fear<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And I will make <S%H6624>Pathros<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>, and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H4996>No<s%>.

And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon <S%H5512>Sin<s%>, the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4996>No<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H5512>Sin<s%> shall have <S%H2342>great<s%> <S%H2342>pain<s%>, and <S%H4996>No<s%> shall be tore <S%H1234>asunder<s%>, and <S%H5297>Noph<s%> shall have <S%H6862>distresses<s%> <S%H3119>daily<s%>.
The young <S%H970>men<s%> of <S%H206>Aven<s%> and of <S%H6364>Pi<s%>â€“beseth shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: and these cities shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.

At <S%H8471>Tehaphnehes<s%> also the <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H2821>darkened<s%>, when I shall <S%H7665>break<s%> there the <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> in <S%H1931>her<s%>: as for <S%H6051>her<s%>, a cloud shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>, and her daughters shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.
Thus will I <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7651>month<s%>, in the seventh day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; <S%H2280>and<s%>, behold, it shall not be bound up to be <S%H7499>healed<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2848>bandage<s%> to <S%H2280>bind<s%> <S%H2388>it<s%>, to make it strong to <S%H8610>hold<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H6547>Behold<s%>, I am against Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H2220>arms<s%>, the <S%H2389>strong<s%>, and that which was <S%H7665>broken<s%>; and I will cause the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and will <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

And I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: but I will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2220>arms<s%>, and he shall <S%H5008>groan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with the <S%H5009>groanings<s%> of a deadly wounded <S%H2491>man<s%>.

But I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall stretch it <S%H5186>out<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
